item.content:encoded:
Price: $62.99 - $45.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:35:03 UTC – Details)



【Your Personal Smart Assistant】Activity tracker (pedometer, calories, distance), heart rate, various sport modes, sleep monitoring.,etc. Get notifications of Call, SMS, and APP messages(THE WATCH CAN NOT MAKE MESSAGES, CALLS or TEXT BACK, Bluetooth distance 8-10 meters), remote control of music and cameras, weather report, sedentary reminder, alarm clock, stopwatch, find phone, call rejection, brightness adjustment, power-saving mode, and other functions to meet your daily needs.
【Long Battery & IP68 Waterproof】The smartwatch only takes 2 hours to charge and can be used for 7-10 days or 30 days standby time, much longer than most traditional watches. The fitness watch is IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when washing hands, in the rain(Note: Do Not use in water more than 100. 40℉, such as showers, saunas, spring, etc).
【Safe Guard Your Health】Advanced HR sensor for accurate and effective heart rate monitoring, helping you better understand your health and making a reasonable adjustment to your lifestyle. Automatic sleep tracking can monitor your sleep status (deep sleep, shallow sleep, awakening) and provide a comprehensive sleep quality analysis to help become healthier. You can view the summary of your status in the fitcloudpro APP.
【Overtake Your Expectations】The AGPTEK smart watch is compatible with most iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher smart phones version to notify you of call, text, email, calendar, and app notifications. The package includes:AGPTEK Smart Watch*1,TPU Silicone Strap*1, Magnetic Charger*1,User Manual*1. If your have any problem, please feel free to contact our customer service via your amazon account.

4
Price: $62.99 - $45.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:35:03 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $675.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:27:13 UTC – Details)



With a 11th Generation InteI Core mobile processor, the Flex 5i touchscreen laptop gives you powerful combination of performance, connectivity, and entertainment on a thin, light computer
The IdeaPad Flex 5i lets you keep your ideas flowing – the 360⁰ hinge lets you use it in ‘Laptop’ mode for everyday computing, ‘Tent’ mode for sharing things, ‘Stand’ mode for binge-watching, or ‘Tablet’ mode for more intuitive interaction
Reduce clutter with a narrow bezel on 4 sides, IPS panel technology, and a 14″ full high-definition touchscreen
A physical shutter on the webcam ensures you keep out unwanted attention when you are concerned about your privacy
Connect with built-in WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5, 2 USB-A ports, USB-C, HDMI, card reader, and 3.5mm headphone & microphone combo jack

item.title: LB3 Smart Lamp, LED Bedside Touch Lamps Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, App Go_sund Control, RGB Color Changing Dimmable & Warm White Night Light for Bedroom, USB Powered
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub requiredHands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

4
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)

TOUCH CONTROL DIMMABLE DESK LAMP — 5000K cool white desk lamp with 3 Brightness Levels, easily adjust the brightness by touch. Cool white lighting great suit for working, studying, reading.
FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE DESIGN — This foldable LED desk lamp with 230° flexible arm and 90° base axis, good help to save desk space. Easy to place in shelves, bags, suitcases, and box.
USB POWER (AC ADAPTER INCLUDED) — You can power the desk lamp by USB Port, easy to plug into any available USB port to power the lamp, such laptop, computer, power bank. Also, you can power by the AC Adapter which includes the package.
EYE CARING TABLE LAMP — This touch table lamps are designed to be soft, stable, and non-flickering light. The office desk lamp adopts surface led light source design which could perfectly eliminate glare, visual fatigue, and improve visual effects.
PREMIUM SERVICE&LONG LIFESPAN–Our led light designed to last for more than 50000 hours, you won’t replace the LED in the next 25 years,The desk lamp led comes with 365 days worry-free service and lifetime nice customer service.Just order this touch lamp without any risk.

Product Description

Soulaca new model 22″ with full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use. Nowadays, more and more people like to watch TV while tasting wine while taking a bath in the bathroom. Soulaca TV mirrors for bathrooms offer you an escape from the everyday, allowing you to wind down in the bath to your choice of movie! Of course, for those private moments when you don’t feel like watching television, your waterproof TV will transform into a discreet and elegant mirror.

Soulaca HUAYU Series

Freeview (Digital) TV: Yes DTV System: ATSC/DVB-T/DVB-T2/DVB-C/DVB-S/DVB-S2 (According to your country) Freeview (Digital) Radio: Yes Analogue Tuner: Yes Internet Specs: RAM: 1G; Storage: 8G; WiFi: 2.4G/5G Display Type: LED Aspect Ratio:16:9, Contrast Ratio: 1000:1 Brightness (cd/m²): 250 Resolution: 1920 x 1080; Display Colors:16.7M; View Angle (°H/V):178/178 Speakers:8Ω5W x 2 Main Power:12V; Power Consumption(W): 23W; Standby Consumption(W): <1 Front Panel Finish: Mirror Frame: Metal Front Panel: Glass Ports and Connectors: TV, HDMI*1, USB*1, Audio Output,LAN(RJ45) , touchscreen Working Humidity: 10%-90% Working Temperature: -10°C ~ +50°C Unit Size (mm) (W x H x D): 501W x 316H x 43Dmm /19.7″W x 12.44″H x 1.69″D Android Version: 7.1 Package Includes: TV, IP68 TV Remote, Power cord, 110-240V adapter, TV holder( Wall Mounting), user manual, screws Set Unit Weight(kg): 5.2 Gross Weight(kg): 8

Full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use

Screen Casting-Supprot Android Phone& iPhone

IP66 rated waterproof. Whether you want to wash with soap operas or primp with prime time, a waterproof TV in the bathroom can help you enjoy the time.

Most of the mirror TV in the market the brightness is very weak. But ours improve the glass quality, which make the TV image more clear in your room. But we also suggest not to use too much lighting. The mirror has reflection, all of the mirror TVs have such reflection.

TV Remote with Holder

The TV remote is ip68 waterproof. Means you could put it into water, when you are taking shower in your bathtub. You have no problem for control the TV!

Serial Number

Each TV has its own ID number, it won’t be repeated which is easily for tracking the information to fix any technical problem for you.

Packing Standard

TV, Power cord, 110-240V adapter, TV holder( Wall Mounting), user manual, screws Set. You can feel free to install the TV by your style.

Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 454.5W x 277.5H x 22.5Dmm/17.89″W x 10.92″H x 0.88″D

VESA Dimensions for On-wall(mm): 100 x 100 (3.93”x3.93”)

USB*2,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN USB*2,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN USB,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN USB,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN, Touchscreen USB*2,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket (NOT INCLUDED)

【IP66 Waterproof Mirror TV】-Soulaca 2022 Model updated TV with IP66 waterproof, dustproof and anti-fog functions is designed for bathroom. A TV turned on and a bright single-sided transmissive mirror turned off looks luxury when installed. Based on years of experience in waterproof TV, Soulaca is continuously updating its products to be considerate and cost-effective.
【Slim Digital TV】-Super narrow border out of display area and resolution 1920×1080, the TV provide high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience. Built-in Satellite with reception HDTV(ATSC) Tuner , have access to local channels. Plug in and play HDMI x 2 and USB allow directly connectivity.
【Dimension & Installation】-Unit Size: 501W x 316H x 43Dmm /19.7″W x 12.44″H x 1.69″D , recess dimensions for In-wall: 454.5W x 277.5H x 22.5Dmm/17.89″W x 10.92″H x 0.88″D. Can be easily recessed or surface mounted with bracket included. Installation instruction please refers to the last picture. Powered with safe DC 12V.
【Shipping & Warranty】 Fulfill by Amazon, 2 years warranty and each of the TV has its serial number to ensure quick and accurate after-sale service. Feel free to contact Soulaca customer service, all messages will be replied within 24hours.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Windows 11 Home (S mode) Experience the most secure Windows ever built with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware. 15.6″ Full HD touch screen for hands-on control Natural finger-touch navigation makes the most of Windows 11. The 1920 x 1080 resolution boasts impressive color and clarity. IPS technology for wide viewing angles. Energy-efficient LED backlight. 256GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive While offering less storage space than a hard drive, a flash-based SSD has no moving parts, resulting in faster start-up times and data access, no noise, and reduced heat production and power draw on the battery. 8GB system memory for advanced multitasking Substantial high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run your games and photo- and video-editing applications, as well as multiple programs and browser tabs all at once. From the brand

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ！

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

【Stepless Dimming with two control ways】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
【Space Saving and Modern Style】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
【Quality Warranty】SHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

Specifications:

Material: metal + silicone

Light bar length: 18.2 inch/ 46 cm

LED numbers: 96 Led beads

Lumen: 1511 Lumen

Brightness: 6 levels

Color temperature: 3000K-6000K

CRI: RA>95

Control type: Touch & Remote

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading.

  • No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently
  • 360°flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction
  • Durable structure with metal and silicone
  • Metal Clamp: 2.6 inch/7.5 cm thickness desk edge
  • Maximum Lighting height: 28.5 inch

Read more

HIGH COLOR RENDERING

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

It supports two types to control the study lamp

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

  • Short touch will change the color
  • Holding touch will change the brightness

Remote Control

  • Dimming Up / Down: 6 Brightness levels
  • Colors Select: Warm white / white / warm
  • Timing setting: 3 minutes(one press)/ 30 minutes( twice)/60 miutes(three times)
  • Mode select: Sleeping mode / Reading mode

SUPER BRIGHT DESK LAMP, SUITABLE for DETAILED OPERATION

Product Description

Tips: Please download the APP and connect it before using the watch, need to link two bluetooths. Please refer to the below.

MVEFOIT Bluetooth Call Smart Watch Make and Receive Calls, Smartphone Smart Notification, AI Voice Control Smart Watch Reply to Text Messages, Make Calls, Open APP. Smart Bracelet on Your Wrist.

Monitor Daily Exercise Data: Steps, Calories, Distances, Minutes, Multiple Sport Modes, GPS Recording Exercise Route.

Heart Rate/ Blood Oxygen/ Sleep Monitor Watch, Automatically Monitor Your Health and Analyze Sleep Quality.

Size Suitable for Most People, Precise Body Design, More Comfortable to Wear, Simple and Stylish.

Smart Watch Compatible with Android 4.4 or above/iOS 8.0 or above Smartphone.

Drink Water Reminder / Sedentary Reminder.

Relax Games, Alarm Clock, Flashlight…………

More Functions Take You to Experience the Intelligent Life of Science and Technology.

Heart Rate / Blood Oxygen / Sleep Monitor

More Functions with Smart Watch

AI Voice Control

Send SMS, make calls, and open mobile APPs through AI voice to make life smarter

Smart Reminder

Smart watch preview calls, messages, facebook, instagram, TikTok, Twitter and other APP reminders

Drinking Reminder&Sedentary Reminder

Smart reminder for healthy life: Set reminders for drinking water or sedentary time, and the smart watch will remind you on time

DIY Watch Face

The watch has its own watch dial, and there are 150+ kinds of dials to choose from in the APP. You can also choose the pictures from your own smart phone album.

Music Control&Camera Control

Smart watch control phone camera to take photos, music switching/pause

Real Time Weather

After the smart watch is connected to the APP, it synchronizes the local weather conditions in real time, one of the essential tools for daily travel

【1.7 Inch Large Screen Smart Watch】Smart watch for women men with 1.7 inch Super Retina HD display, 245*285 HD resolution, better color saturation, the picture quality is more delicate and clear, bring you more open visual enjoyment. In Addition, 150+ watch dials can be used, and you can define your own photo album.Be yourself better from a watch.
【 Health Management】Fitness watch has a built-in enhanced biosensor chip that integrates optics, structure and algorithm, uses PPG photoelectric sensor principles to monitor accurately. It supports 7*24 hour heart rate monitoring to protect your health. Besides, our smart watch gold also supports blood oxygen and sleep monitoring, which will help you better understand your health on a deep level.
【Your Exclusive Sports Life】Accurately record your daily activities like number of steps, distance, calories burned. It helps you track daily activities with real-time stats on smart watch men and get good fitness effects. Supports multiple sports modes, such as swimming, running, cycling, etc. You can intuitively read your exercise data on the watch. Smart watch for iphone compatible with android 4.4 and above, iOS 8.0 and above smartphone.
【20+ Convenient Functions】Bluetooth calls, music playing, heart rate measurement, blood oxygen measurement, sleep monitor, breathing training, sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder, SMS text or SNS notifications (Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, etc.), games, theater mode, weather forecast, Camera control, alarm clock, waterproof, 8 sports modes, stopwatch, fitness tracker (steps, calories, km) etc. Make your life healthier and your work more efficient.

MVEFOIT

This is a brand that specializes in selling watches. We have a professional factory, dedicated to R&D and innovation, leading fashion

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Leotachi is a professional manufacturer of waterproof bathroom mirror TVs.

Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom

Screen Support 360° Rotation（New upgrade）Lock Screen Function（New upgrade）High-Speed Processor RK3288 (Smooth Operation）Touch Screen and IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Double Control)Automatic Defogging FunctionIP66 High-grade Waterproof

Upgraded mirror TV

Bright and Clear Screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and 500nits high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers(10w), Leotachi TV provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.

Luxury bathroom mirror tv

When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a Multifunctional TV and a luxury mirror at the same time.

Multipurpose mirror tv

Leotachi mirror TV has advanced performance, can support watching movies, listening to music, playing games, etc.,

Different Bathroom Mirror TV – 360° rotating

IP66 waterproof 1080P bathroom mirror TV system supports rotating the screen by 360°. We also recommend that you can choose a 360° rotating bracket (Available at Leotachi stores), and you can switch the angle and distance you want at will.

Multiple layers of materials are superimposed to make it waterproof and fog-proof

Package included:

When you receive the goods, please carefully confirm whether it is complete.

1 x 21.5inch Bathroom Mirror waterproof TV 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control(Need extra CR2025 battery)） 1 x Wall Bracket 1 x Installation Manual 1 x DC 12V Adapter

Professional Waterproof Level Mirror TV

A waterproof TV that is safe to use around humid environment. The TV is typically sealed in such a way that they can be splashed, rained on, submerged in water and other liquids and still function.

1. Waterproof Level : IP66 2. Overall size : 515(W)*312(H)*36(D)mm / 23.7 inch 3. Screen size: 476(W)-268(D)mm / 21.5 inch 4. Resolution: 1920*1080 5. Net Weight: 5.5KG 6. Working Temperature: -40 ~76°C 7. Power consumption : 60W (standby≤1W) 8. Speaker Power: 10w*2.

For Women

You can use Leotachi’ TV to watch your favorite movies or short videos.

For Men

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite competitions or news

For Kids

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite cartoons or play games

For Family

You can use Leotachi’TV to improve family harmony and get everyone in the family to love bathing!

IMPORTANT NOTICE

· Mirrors Damaged/Chipped on Arrival,No return needed.

· All you need to do is sending us photos.We will provide you with the most satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

· Please check the outer package while receiving, only accept whole package. And please check whether the mirror is intact.、

【Upgraded Smooth Touch Screen System】The mirror TV is a 10-point touch screen technology that supports a variety of gestures, you can also freely choose touch screen or remote control. The system uses a high-speed processor RK3288 – Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17 architecture to ensure smooth operation when using.
【Upgraded Brightness and Volume】Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V adapter, The brightness of 500cd/m2 is brighter than similar products on the market, bringing you different visual effects; in addition, the dual-speaker design allows you to hear clearly in noisy environments; better heat dissipation fast and prolong the service life of the product.
【Multifunctional luxury mirror】 When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a multifunction TV and a luxury mirror at the same time. Leotachi’s TV has a professional-grade IP66 waterproof rating, and the screen is automatically defogged without additional operation. especially suitable for some wet or extreme places, such as bathroom, shower, kitchen, swimming pool, yacht, sauna, spa, hot tub, steam room, etc.
【Installation and After Sales】 The Leotachi Bathroom TV comes with a wall mount bracket that can be easily installed in a wall recess or fixed to the wall by just one person. leotachi Bathroom TV is professionally certified and we offer a 1 year warranty. Please feel free to contact us for more details, all messages will be answered within 24 hours.

Leotachi Waterproof Mirror TV
